deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=note_translate.settings_production && echo "Creating media directory..." && mkdir -p /data/media && echo "Starting migrations..." && python3 manage.py migrate && echo "Migrations completed, starting Gunicorn..." && echo "Port: $PORT" && gunicorn note_translate.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --timeout 1200 --worker-class sync --workers 3 --max-requests 500 --max-requests-jitter 50 --log-level debug --preload'
